fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make someone sign your petition, becoming a **Signee**.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- There are 2 levels of your status: **Interested** and **Signee**.
- Players who visit you or another **Interested/Signee** player will become **Interested**.
- Players who become **Interested** twice will sign your petition and become a **Signee**.
- You know the names of all **Interested/Signee** players.
- Once everyone alive signs your petition, you will gain 3 votes.
- You have a 2-use basic autovest, you lose it once you reach your goal.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have everyone alive be a Signee of your petition.
